title: Adi (1984) Genesis Portion
description: This fragment of the Book of Genesis chapters 1 through 3, tells how God created the world. It is in the Adi language which is spoken in India and was published by The Bible Society of India in 1984.

language.name: Adi
language.area: Arunachal Pradesh, East, West, and Upper Siang districts, Upper Subansiri and Dibang Valley districts; Assam, north hills of Assam Valley, between Bhutan and the Buruli River. Also in Bhutan, China.
